activities.name: Copy data from bolb to sql

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
* 
from 
newdb.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
where TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
select max(last_M) as last_m from tbluser
select lastloaddate as lastloaddate from tblcontrol

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from tbluser
where last_m <=
'@{activity('get last max date').output.firstrow.last_m}'
and last_m >
'@{activity('last updated date').output.firstrow.lastloaddate}'
